Specimen Container(s): Oragene®•Dx container (collection tube with funnel lid and stabilizing liquid)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Non-invasive saliva collection with nucleic acid stabilization
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Oragene®•Dx saliva collection device for non-invasive human DNA sample collection, stabilization, and transport for downstream molecular diagnostic testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for non-invasive collection of saliva samples for in vitro diagnostic testing of human DNA; samples can be self-collected or collected with assistance, stabilized for downstream diagnostic applications, and transported/stored at ambient temperature
